page.title: 13RECREATION IN POYNTON (2)
page.content: POYNTON SPORTS CENTRE Mr Atkinson the manager of the centre told us about 1,000 High School students use the centre between 9a.m. and 5p.m.each week and about 2,500 people at other times.Activities include squash,swimming,badminton. The most popular is swimming POYNTON SOCIAL CENTRE Mr Brock the secretary of the centre explained that the centre was non profit making supported by members. About 1,400 people take part in various activities from weight-lifting to junior Red-Cross.A Youth Club is held at the centre 4 times a week, and the Junior Disco, which is attended by 400 young people is the most popular event.
